passed_checks.check_name: Ensure that WORKDIR values are absolute paths
code_block:
FROM python:3.11-slim
WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
        build-essential \
        libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev \
        libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY requirements.txt /app/requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY . /app
EXPOSE 8080

ENV FLASK_ENV=development
ENV DEBUG=true
CMD ["python", "app.py"]

failed_checks.check_name: Ensure that a user for the container has been created
code_block:
FROM python:3.11-slim
WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
        build-essential \
        libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev \
        libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY requirements.txt /app/requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY . /app
EXPOSE 8080

ENV FLASK_ENV=development
ENV DEBUG=true
CMD ["python", "app.py"]
